response.original_title: Legends of the Silver Screen: The Biographies Collection
response.overview: Roll out the red carpet and get set to meet 9 of Hollywood’s most glamorous legends! Peel back the silver screen curtain and find out what makes a star shine! Where did Anthony “Zorba the Greek” Quinn actually grow up? What happened to Shirley Temple after the “Good Ship Lollipop” of child superstardom sailed? Was Grace Kelly always destined to be a princess? You’ll find the answers to these and many other questions in this collection! LEGENDS OF THE SILVER SCREEN contains more than 8 hours worth of in-depth biographical material, assembled from interviews, newsreels, and memorable film clips! Throw in a wealth of star photo galleries—combining glamour stills and candid behind-the-scenes shots—and you’ve got a collection that belongs on the Walk of Fame! Take a fascinating look into the lives of the legends and starlets of hollywood! Biographies include: Anthony Quinn, Charlton Heston, Yul Brynner, Audrey Hepburn, Grace Kelly, Marilyn Monroe, Jack Lemmon, Shirley Temple, Walter Matthau
response.tagline: Roll out the red carpet and get set to meet 9 of Hollywood’s most glamorous legends!
response.title: Legends of the Silver Screen: The Biographies Collection
